mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(info.order_goods_actual_price * go.`first_profit`),0) AS profit FROM litemall_order_goods_info info LEFT JOIN litemall_goods go ON info.`goods_id` = go.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND info.is_extract = 0 AND info.order_goods_status IN ('201','301','302','401','402','403','501') AND info.user_id IN (SELECT id FROM litemall_user WHERE p_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER})

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(info.order_goods_actual_price * go.`second_profit`),0) AS profit FROM litemall_order_goods_info info LEFT JOIN litemall_goods go ON info.`goods_id` = go.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND info.is_extract = 0 AND info.order_goods_status IN ('201','301','302','401','402','403','501') AND info.user_id IN (SELECT id FROM litemall_user WHERE p_id IN (SELECT id FROM litemall_user WHERE p_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}))

SELECT e.order_id, e.order_goods_info_id, e.order_goods_id AS goods_id, e.`profit_money`, date_format(e.operation_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") AS operation_time,/*操作时间*/ oi.goods_name, date_format(oi.add_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") AS add_time FROM `litemall_earnings` e LEFT JOIN litemall_order_goods_info oi ON e.`order_goods_info_id` = oi.order_goods_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.operation = 1 AND e.profit_user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT e.id, date_format(e.operation_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") AS operation_time, e.profit_user_id, e.profit_money, u.username, u.avatar FROM litemall_earnings e LEFT JOIN litemall_user u ON e.profit_user_id = u.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.operation = 2 AND e.profit_user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT e.id, e.order_id, e.order_sn, e.order_goods_info_id, e.order_goods_id AS goods_id, e.`profit_money`, e.operation,/*操作类型：1：收益，2：提取*/ date_format(e.operation_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") AS operation_time,/*操作时间*/ oi.goods_name, date_format(oi.add_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") AS add_time,/* 下单时间*/ oi.user_id,/*下单人*/ u.username/*下单人名称*/ FROM `litemall_earnings` e LEFT JOIN litemall_order_goods_info oi ON e.`order_goods_info_id` = oi.order_goods_id LEFT JOIN litemall_user u ON u.id = oi.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.profit_user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.avatar, DATE_FORMAT(u.add_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") AS add_time, u.p_id, ( select label.label_name from litemall_label_user labelUser LEFT JOIN litemall_label label on labelUser.label_id = label.id where labelUser.user_id = u.id ) as lebelName, (SELECT count(1) FROM litemall_user WHERE p_id = u.id) AS promotion_user,/* 我推广的人数 */ IFNULL(sum(e.profit_money),0) AS sum_profit_money, /* 下级总消费收益 */ count(e.order_id) AS order_count /* 下级消费订单数*/ FROM litemall_user u LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM litemall_earnings WHERE profit_type = 'first') e ON e.customer_user_id = u.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND p_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY u.id, u.username, u.avatar, u.p_id

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.avatar, e.profit_money , /* 收益 */ e.order_id AS order_count, /* 下级消费订单数*/ DATE_FORMAT(gi.add_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") AS add_time,/* 下单时间 */ gi.goods_name,/* 商品名称 */ gi.order_goods_actual_price /* 实际付款金额 */ FROM litemall_user u LEFT JOIN litemall_earnings e ON e.customer_user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN litemall_order_goods_info gi on gi.order_goods_id =e.order_goods_info_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.profit_type = 'first' AND p_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.avatar, DATE_FORMAT(u.add_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") AS add_time, u.p_id, (SELECT count(1) FROM litemall_user WHERE p_id = u.id) AS promotion_user, /* 我推广的人数 */ IFNULL(sum(e.profit_money),0) AS sum_profit_money, /* 下级总消费收益 */ count(e.order_id) AS order_count /* 下级消费订单数*/ FROM litemall_user u LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM litemall_earnings WHERE profit_type = 'second') e ON e.customer_user_id = u.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND p_id IN (SELECT id FROM litemall_user WHERE p_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}) GROUP BY u.id, u.username, u.avatar, u.p_id

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.avatar, e.profit_money , /* 收益 */ e.order_id AS order_count, /* 下级消费订单数*/ DATE_FORMAT(gi.add_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") AS add_time,/* 下单时间 */ gi.goods_name,/* 商品名称 */ gi.order_goods_actual_price /* 实际付款金额 */ FROM litemall_user u LEFT JOIN litemall_earnings e ON e.customer_user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN litemall_order_goods_info gi on gi.order_goods_id =e.order_goods_info_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.profit_type = 'second' AND p_id IN (SELECT id FROM litemall_user WHERE p_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

SELECT e.id, date_format(e.operation_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") AS operationTime, e.profit_money as profitMoney, e.operation, e.remark FROM litemall_earnings e WHERE 1 = 1 AND (e.operation = 2 or e.operation = 3) AND e.profit_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
